summary: A French lieutenant makes a bet that he can seduce any woman in town in the two weeks before his regiment leaves for maneuvers, but his chosen target (a Parisian divorcée) isn't like other girls he's known.
cast: Michèle Morgan|Gérard Philipe|Jean Desailly|Pierre Dux|Jacques Fabbri|Jacques François|Yves Robert|Brigitte Bardot|Lise Delamare|Jacqueline Maillan|Magali Noël|Simone Valère|Catherine Anouilh|Madeleine Barbulée|Dany Carrel|Gabrielle Fontan|Viviane Gosset|Judith Magre|Arlette Thomas|Raymond Cordy|Olivier Hussenot|Jacques Jouanneau|Jacques Morel|Palau|Claude Rich|Daniel Sorano|France Asselin|Robert Balpo|Jean Bayle|Georges Bever|Georges Carrère|Colette Castel|Daniel Ceccaldi|Guy Cosson|Charles Debert|Jean Degrave|Bernard Dhéran|Hélène Duc|Paul Faivre|Georges Galley|Gilles Gallon|Pierre Langlet|Robert Le Béal|Claude Magnier|Jacqueline Marbaux|Pierre Maréchal|Jean-Pierre Maurin|Anne-Marie Mersen|Michel Piccoli|Pierre Roussel|Clément Thierry|Roger Vincent
title: Las maniobras del amor
